website_summaries.verdict: This popular biotin supplement offers a high potency of vitamin B7 to support strong hair, skin, and nails.
pros: High potency dosage for supreme results
Supports hair, skin, and nail strength
cons: Company has had some past issues with the quality control

website_summaries.verdict: Made with cold-pressed coconut oil, this product showcases a high-potency supplement with natural ingredients.
pros: Doesn't contain fillers, binders, gluten, dairy, or wheat
cons: A few women had problems with acne breakouts
Contains tree nuts, which may cause an allergic reaction for some

customer_reviews.title: I think it's working
customer_reviews.text: Okay, so I posted a picture of my haircut in July 9th 2018... then another picture from October 27th 2018... I had a trim somewhere in between there. I have been taking these biotin supplements since September 9th and today is November 2nd. So almost two months I've been taking them. My hair grows so slow. I definitely feel though that I have gained some length going from chin/shoulder length to well past shoulder length in this time frame. I take one supplement every single day. I don't know if it's actually helping my hair grow but you can see it definitely has grown so I'm giving this 5 stars and will continue to keep taking them.
customer_reviews.author: Penelope

customer_reviews.title: Want to stop loosing hair try these vitamins
customer_reviews.text: My review is more like a comparison. I had been using another brand (from Walmart) for years. I like them as my eyelashes had grown and so did my nails. But something inside my head told me there’s got to be better biotin vitamins out there as I started loosing a lot of hair. So I ordered this vitamins and I couldn’t be happier within a week I noticed I was hardly loosing any more hair. My nails are growing twice as fast as before and they seem to be stronger. I will definitely keep buying these vitamins. Try them you won’t regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Isabel Garcia

customer_reviews.title: It's a gamble for acne prone skin
customer_reviews.text: Bummed because I was really excited about this product based on all the raving reviews. I actually did notice my hair felt a little thicker after beginning to take this (about a week or two) and then started to break out a lot. It's normal for me to get a spot time to time but this was like an army came and attacked my face overnight. This was the only new addition to my routine and after seeing similar reviews that people have broken out I'm pretty sure this is the culprit. I've stopped using it and my skin is already clearing up.
customer_reviews.author: Molly B

customer_reviews.title: Horrible break outs
customer_reviews.text: This product ruined my skin. I went from no pimples at all to a face full for the whole time I was taking them. When I finally researched biotin online and stopped taking this, no more pimples.
customer_reviews.author: Yoga

customer_reviews.title: I fell in love with this product
customer_reviews.text: 2016 was the first time when I started using this product. I fell in love with this product. I love coconut, but now I love your coconut biotin which is easier to take in the morning or before meal. My hair is looking so good now, I’m taking it 2 years for now and wouldn’t stop. Thank you for a great product. I haven’t seen better biotin than this one. I don’t have any redness on my skin after using this or something. It’s just a good supplement to help your body get a great support.
customer_reviews.author: D.N.Top Contributor: Cross-Stitch

customer_reviews.title: Prone to acne? Don't get.
customer_reviews.text: I got this and started taking less than the recommended dosage and within a week, I had a major break out. My family has a history of cystic acne and I've been battling it since I was 13, this made my acne 10x worse. If you are prone to acne, especially cystic acne, I would not recommend getting this.
customer_reviews.author: L. Lang

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works!
customer_reviews.text: A little over a month's difference. My hair feels thicker & is visibly longer! I didn't take it consistently. Thumbs up for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Made me break out
customer_reviews.text: Faithfully took this for 6 weeks. The only difference I saw was the whole 6 weeks my face was broken out with acne. After stopping it for 3 days face cleared up. Do not recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Really helps thin hair
customer_reviews.text: I took 10,000mcg for 1 1/2 months. I could not believe the difference in my hair. It was thicker and fuller. My hairdresser noticed without my saying anything. She is now recommending to all who complain of thin hair. I do have thyroid testing twice a year. Luckily I had read articles on false TSH with Biotin. So when my test was a little off doctor researched and ran T3 & T4 which were fine. I am now taking 5,000 mcg. I have recommended to two other friends with thin hair complaints. Both are now buying product and say it makes a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Saraxh2

customer_reviews.title: Zit producer, so awful
customer_reviews.text: What is in this ?!? Ive had acne but this is ridiculous. My chin looks like a braille book & all the zit cream can't help! I have taken other biotin & have not had this reaction. I'm so confused.
customer_reviews.author: AAA

customer_reviews.title: Made no difference in hair and nails, broke out skin
customer_reviews.text: I do not see any difference with these pills! I was taking the It Works brand hair skin nails vitamins but wanted to try something cheaper. My hair and nails aren't growing fast like they were on the other pills. And my skin has been so broken out for the first time in my life... I'm not sure if it's the pills but reading the reviews, lots of other people are getting acne from them so I am going to stop taking them.
customer_reviews.author: aly tee

customer_reviews.title: While I see this has worked for others, be ...
customer_reviews.text: While I see this has worked for others, be careful if you decide to take it. I ended up in the ER after 3 weeks on this. Do some research on what Biotin can do to your body. I was having sever symptoms of Graves Disease and was diagnosed with Hyperthyroid, when only a few months ago I had my thyroid tested and it was functioning normally. I can't drive for at least a week because I am constantly dizzy, lightheaded, nauseous, and experiencing black outs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Causes large pimples
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know how or why but this product causes large pimples to form along my chin every single time I take it. I wasn’t sure if it was the product so I took a few months off from taking it and the pimples went away. Smooth, clear skin. As soon as I started taking them again, I began to get the large pimples. I have tried this on/off method several times to be sure that it is the biotin and it has to be. Not sure how to explain why this happens but I will not be taking these any longer.
customer_reviews.author: SP03

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using SR Biotin for over 6 months now. I purchased it as a recommendation from my doctor as my fingernails keeps splitting. This did the trick. Amazing how much healthier my nails are now. I found that 10,000mcg is needed however so had to take two of the 5000 initially but have since purchased SR's 10,000mcg capsules. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: scaryd

customer_reviews.title: This Supplement works!
customer_reviews.text: I am taking this supplement from last 3 months. It has given amazing results. In addition to this I am using Castor and coconut oil hair oil once in a week. Before and after pics says it all.
customer_reviews.author: S.A.

customer_reviews.title: Loving this product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my dog who has an autoimmune disease that affects his nails. Finally his nails are growing back strong! All of the other products that I researched had a ton of "inactive ingredients" that he can't have. I'm very happy with the quality of this product! Update: I decided to try this product myself to see if it would help my own hair and nails. At my last hair appointment my hairdresser commented on how thick my hair is and my nails are so long and strong that they don't even look real! Loving this product even more now!
customer_reviews.author: KCF

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Have been taking these for 2 months now and see absolutely no changes in my hair. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: lisa gaeta

customer_reviews.title: Not working
customer_reviews.text: HONEST REVIEW I bought this bottle after reading good reviews but when i got the bottle with that it has a notice it says if you review them good they will send you extra free bottle as come i got to know how they got very good reviews plus as they mention biotin i check the capsule it only has coconut oil nothing else no biotin at all and i also use this bottle around 2 weeks no result at all.
customer_reviews.author: Aiman

customer_reviews.title: Cystic Acne Alert!!!
customer_reviews.text: After a month of religiously using this product, it never occurred to me why my chin was covered in cystic painful acne. I blamed it on sugar and my period. I got a facial, microdermabrasion, led light sessions and was right about to go into the dermatologist for an emergency appointment. Then I reread the reviews of this biotin and how the dosage and ingredients way more potent and reacts to the skin more dramatically if you have combination/oily skin. This could have been prevented, I’m so bummed! 😭
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: Great for hair and nails
customer_reviews.text: My hair started to fall out and my nails were growing in brittle. I knew I was lacking vitamins/nutrients and decided to give this a try. Took about 4 weeks to start seeing a difference in my nails and hair. My hairline is filling up and my nails have started to grow in quickly. 5,000mcg is the most I would go. I've tried 10,000mcg but it made my face breakout. So be cautious because some people can have a reaction to higher dosing.
customer_reviews.author: Island MarieTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Nails are growing like crazy!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product! The capsules have a small hint of coconut oil when you take them. They’re very easy to swallow, and no aftertaste. In a short amount of time I have noticed that my nails have been growing out of control! I had to trim them the other day, and normally I don’t have to do that because they will break or snag/peel before I get to that point. They seem to have gotten stronger, as they have grown longer. My hair has been growing a lot faster too, i cludig leg hair haha. That’s my only downside! I would definitely recommend for anyone who is debating!
customer_reviews.author: C. Harrah

customer_reviews.title: WOW! IT WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: I've been taking one of this product along with Collagen Peptides Powder (16oz) | Grass-Fed, Certified Paleo Friendly, Non-Gmo and Gluten Free - Unflavored by Sports Research for 20 days. 'Stress barometer' areas around my hairline are completely filled in and hair is growing 2x's faster than normal. I experienced a hair disaster with a product I didn't understand was for African American hair with castor oil, scrubbing away like I would with any other shampoo broke 2/3 of my hair almost to the scalp. This product is wonderful for hair along with smoothing my skin. Thank you Sports Research~
customer_reviews.author: Corinthians

customer_reviews.title: This product is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! The pill is really small and easy to swallow and it has worked great for me! In the pictures you can see my progress in only one month. I would recommend this to anyone. :)
customer_reviews.author: Gaby Bisonó

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING High Quality Product That's Affordable
customer_reviews.text: I am in the process of bleaching my hair- going from reddish light brown to platinum white. I have been taking Sports Research Biotin 5,000 mcg for a few months now. [I order it as a subscribe and save product.] I absolutely LOVE what it has done to my hair and skin. Even though I am bleaching my hair, my hair is so strong, healthy, and soft! Thank you Sports Research for making such a high quality product at an affordable price!
customer_reviews.author: QuinnieMarie

customer_reviews.title: Loosing hair..wth!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking 1 tablet daily. I have had excessive hair shedding since starting these.. Not cool!! Of course people shed hair daily but this is a full wookie everything I put my hand in my hair... Nope, no bueno. I have stopped immediately before I am bald ughhh!!
customer_reviews.author: Brie

customer_reviews.title: Great Biotin!
customer_reviews.text: I started using Biotin about six months after finishing my chemo treatments for breast cancer. It wasn’t till I came across Sports Research that I really felt like I was finally seeing results. My nails were getting stronger again and my hair was growing back! It’s been about 2 yrs now and my hair has grown in beautifully and super long! So excited to use this brand of biotin and I truly trust this brand! Thank you Sports Research!
customer_reviews.author: Lulu

customer_reviews.title: Works beyond my expectations!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product since I had a bit of a mishap while trying to grow my hair. A friend of mine recommended that I get it as it helps with hair growth. I was a bit skeptical but gave it a shot and wow did it not disappoint. I less than a year not only did I regain the loss of the hair I had been trying to grow for over a year, I am well beyond what my hair was! I cannot be happier with the results on how great my hair length and healthiness is.
customer_reviews.author: SFG

customer_reviews.title: Biotin: Keratin’s Best Friend
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy with Sports Research products in general and the biotin 5,000mcg supplement is no exception. The softgels were all intact and are easy to swallow. My hair is holding its own (I can detect no change), but where I really notice the difference is in my nails: I tend to break nails frequently and with little provocation, but I can definitely tell my nails grow faster and are tougher when taking this product. At the end of the day I reordered, and that's a recommendation that speaks for itself.
customer_reviews.author: Robert I. HedgesTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely useless. I have used it for a month and my once very strong nails are still crumbling. I feel lucky I did not have any of the bad reactions others did.
customer_reviews.author: Lily Gibbs

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Sports Research Biotin 5000 for more than a year and I absolutely love the results in my hair and nails. My hair grows fast but as I got older my hair was becoming more brittle and hair fall had increased to the point I was nervous. I started taking these pills because they were infused with coconut oil. I started one a day and by week two I would take 2 pills. Within one 2 months my nails were stronger hair not as brittle. I still experience hair fall but not as intense as before. So now these are a part of my daily routine and cannot live without.
customer_reviews.author: Maryland Mom

customer_reviews.title: Beware Company gives away free product for positive reviews!
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this for almost 3 months and have not seen any result in my hair growth, my hair is as thin as it has been and falling out non stop. Only good thing about this product is it doesn’t have any bs in it. And I can see where all the good reviews come from, the company offers a free product for a good review, so I’m sure 85% of the reviews are fake, are from people who haven’t tried the product or just want free stuff! Also this is way overpriced for doing nothing
customer_reviews.author: Paris K.

customer_reviews.title: My New Favorite
customer_reviews.text: This product really works !! I wore hair extensions for years and my edges suffer in the process, a couple of months ago I took them out and got a new cut and style and realized I needed something to regrow my edges. I took these pills and a Lil more than half the bottle in I noticed my sides growing back in. My hairdresser said , wow those pills are working. I started with 5000 mcg and didn’t see much Then I took 10,000 mcg amount and that worked better for me and showed great results.
customer_reviews.author: Shay

customer_reviews.title: Beware....
customer_reviews.text: After taking this once a day for 10 days I experienced nausea, vomiting, headaches and breakouts on my face. My skin is very dry and I rarely ever get any breakouts, I also drank a gallon of water a day. Very disappointed and please beware! I had to miss two days of work and go to doctors.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: 3 1/2 stars if I could
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product everyday for almost 2 months now. I can't say there have really been cons to this product. I got it with the hopes that my hair will start to grow out thicker, but unfortunately there's no sign that has happened for me yet. It's hard to tell if the rate of my hair growth has actually increased as my hair generally grows pretty quickly (thin, straight). In regards to its effect on skin-- I haven't noticed any differences in my skin. Which I suppose is a good thing! I do think my nails grow a little faster though! I'd give this product 3 1/2 stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: Too oily
customer_reviews.text: These gave me horribly oily skin. Pimples started growing all over my face after 3 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Rowsell

customer_reviews.title: No longer contains carrageenan
customer_reviews.text: This product NO LONGER contains carrageenan, they have updated to better ingredients. With that said, this has caused me break outs too. Cystic ones. After doing some research, I've learned that it's the Biotin itself, and not this particular brand of biotin that is causing break outs. This can be countered by taking a dry vitamin A and E supplement, and making sure to drink plenty of water. Perhaps also look at what foods heavy in biotin that you're eating, your body only needs so much. There are lots of articles online. This product did help my hair and nails grow faster, did nothing for my skin and had to start taking vitamin A with it. Now all is well.
customer_reviews.author: Colombine

customer_reviews.title: coming from a bald man
customer_reviews.text: I want to start off by saying I shave my head, but I take these daily! It is for my beard! I love these things! They really help my beard grow, and my nails. However, when I was still trying to keep my hair, these helped a little. Too be honest, I was losing my hair since I was 20, so only an act of God would get me my hair back, but these did help produce little hairs, that made it look fuller. These are great!
customer_reviews.author: Djsmee

customer_reviews.title: Goodbye patchy beard!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is almost like something you'd come across late at night on a sketchy infomercial, except its the real deal. The real shocker is how subtle it works, I mean its hair right? Not grass, so it's not like it's sprouting up all over the place. It's the little things, such as in my case my crown filled out more, and my beard and facial hair thickened. If you've ever wondered why you can't grow a full beard, sometimes it's just genetics. I didn't realize until I stop getting comments about my beard not filling in, but quite the opposite that it was working.
customer_reviews.author: Adam O.

customer_reviews.title: I'm breaking out : (
customer_reviews.text: I'm 47 years old with pretty good skin and I'm breaking out after taking this supplement. I don't take anything else (other supplements), I just chose this product for hair growth but had to stop due to sudden "pimple breakouts." The reviews warned of this, but I had to try. I'd proceed with caution - hopefully it will work for you, but I had to stop.
customer_reviews.author: Suburbanstylista

customer_reviews.title: It works!!
customer_reviews.text: It works. My hair started thinning out after I had my daughter. I used to have so much hair and out of nowhere it started falling down till I had barely any. So I decided to try these pills based on the reviews and boy do they work! They're small pearls that you can easily swallow and don't really taste like anything. Been taking two pills a day and these are my results after 1.5 months. I'll definitely keep taking. And recommend.
customer_reviews.author: yestfl

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable eyelash growth
customer_reviews.text: There Aren't Enough stars for me to grade this product High Enough. Honestly the best product I've ever taken for hair growth, nail growth and eyelash growth. My eyelashes are almost embarrassingly long. I am 55 years old and I actually cannot wear mascara now without looking like a clown. My lashes are freakishly thick dark and long. And I'm having to trim my fingernails weekly. My hair was falling out and thin and brittle and within a very short time is back to healthy. I just can't say enough about this product so so so happy I just accidentally stumbled across it and ordered it on a shopping whim one night.
customer_reviews.author: PAMALUCHI

customer_reviews.title: Stuff works! Drink more water to prevent breakouts :)
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is the tits!!!! My hair has grown an inch in the past 4 weeks. I take two every morning with my breakfast. Initially I was just taking one, but I read some reviews from some people who were taking two. When I started taking two I broke out for a couple of days, but I increase my water intake and I stopped breaking out! At this rate I will have hair past my boobs by summer!!!
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: I was hoping these would work
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping to really see a difference with these. I moved to another state that is about 10° degrees colder and a bit dry. I had a problem with dry and brittle hair already and it is now exacerbated now that I am in a different climate. Someone recommended biotin because she noticed a tremendous difference in her hair so I decided to give it a try. I have not noticed any changes... If anything I think my hair has just continued it's sad dry decline.
customer_reviews.author: Madeline

customer_reviews.title: My edges grew so much!
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking this product for about 2 1/2 months and I cant believe how much my hair has grown. I have naturally curly hair and it takes time for notice any growth in general. I take the biotin pill once a day with my smoothie and recently noticed that my hair has grown so much and that my edges are noticeably longer!! I forgot I even had edges until now. My boyfriend even mentioned that my hair "looks long and healthy". This is great for anyone trying to grow their hair out! Five stars from me :)
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: One step to thicker hair
customer_reviews.text: I have pretty thick hair, so I started getting a little worried when I would run my fingers through my hair and could suddenly feel a difference in texture and thickness. I stopped tying my hair everyday and picked up some of these pills. They taste good and I’ve been consistent with 1 a day since I got them. I also got myself some other supplements that gave me a boost in other vitamins such as iron. I think it was the combination of all of these things that really brought my hair back to life. It honestly feels thicker than ever!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Chavez

customer_reviews.title: I decided to give it a try after looking at ...
customer_reviews.text: I decided to give it a try after looking at the pictures from here and wow! I am so amazed😱😱 Before using it I had basically no eye lashes and now I just realize they are growing back again!! I recomend it 100%❤️💕
customer_reviews.author: Ariadna L.

customer_reviews.title: Good price, and quality. My hair looks so much healthier.
customer_reviews.text: I started taking this for my hair and skin. I do feel like my hair has a nice healthy shine again. I had been pretty sick, and felt my hair had lost its thickness, and shine. I feel like it is getting back to its healthy feel and look. I’m glad I started taking this to help regain my nice head of hair. I even got my first compliment last week on how healthy my hair looks, and I agree. Looking good. Happy with my purchase, and I will reorder.
customer_reviews.author: annie

customer_reviews.title: Watch Out for Allergic Reactions!!!
customer_reviews.text: Don't know what it is about this product, but I had to completely stop taking it. I'm not a teenager, nor am I in my 20's or 30's, but my face has broken out in the worst case of pimples and it itches like mad. My skin is swollen and very patchy, even the skin around my eyes and eye lids is itching. I'm having a LOT of trouble soothing my facial skin and getting it to calm down. It's going on a week already and I just want to scream because I can't get any relief.
customer_reviews.author: BlackHeartNY

customer_reviews.title: I'm a believer!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical but I gave it a try and so glad I did! I've been taking 5000mcg once a day for a month now and I just got proof that's working. I got a cut and color last week and these pictures show about 1cm of growth at my temples after only 8 days! I've also had to trim my nails twice this month (can't type when my nails are too long)! I'm sold on this product 😁
customer_reviews.author: Solina B.

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING MUST BUY IF YOUR LOSING HAIR
customer_reviews.text: It is soooo amazing worth more than 5 stars my husband who have severe balding is so happy because it has work amazingly for his hair and in under two weeks we saw a great improvement would recommend
customer_reviews.author: love14

customer_reviews.title: Works well enough!
customer_reviews.text: My hair grows slower than average, and I am trying to grow it out semi-quickly, so I bought this product. I like the pills, they're easy to swallow and flavorless, and dont require much attention compared to a product you have to put in your hair, leave for 20 minutes and rinse out, or even a powder you have to add to your food. I feel like my hair grew somewhat faster than normal, but not an extraordinary amount. The pictures are 4 months apart and it seems like my hair grew about 2 inches. Hope this is helpful!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Nails seem to grow faster and stronger
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for nail health. I damaged both big toe nails running and wanted to promote faster and stronger growth since toenails grow so slow. So far, these are great. I’ve had them for a little over a month and I’ve had to clip my nails a few times (which is unusual, since they grow so slow). Fingernails have also seemed stronger and have broken less. My hair has always been unhealthy, so until I’m able to get a haircut to get the ends off, it’s hard to tell how it’s working on my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Clara Merriman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for damaged nails!
customer_reviews.text: This product works very well for me. I unfortunately had to remove my acrylics nails due to the coronavirus pandemic and it left my nails horribly damaged. I have been taking this product for about 2-3 weeks and I have already seen a major improvement in my nails. They have finally grown back and are way stronger. My hair I have also noticed has grown a little more as well. My hair is super healthy and shiny. I have not experienced any breakouts as many other people have wrote. My skin is usually more on the dry end and I noticed this hydrates it more.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Chrissy

customer_reviews.title: No improvement in hair
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this from last six months and no difference at all. I was really hoping for good results but turns out my hair started falling more.
customer_reviews.author: resh

customer_reviews.title: Recommended by my PRN for unexplained hair loss
customer_reviews.text: I noticed unexplained hair loss recently. After going to my PRN and having my thyroid levels checked and confirming that all is well, he suggested that I begin taking a Collagen supplement and Biotin. I have been taking grass fed collagen for a couple of years, but have recently added in Sports Research Biotin. This is easy to take, and seems to be helping! I love that it's a non gmo product and made with coconut oil. Definitely recommend this, and the other Sports Research products. (I also take SR Collagen, Fish Oil and k2/D3..)
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Moore

customer_reviews.title: Good solution to a horrible haircut.
customer_reviews.text: I never take any pills or supplements, so I was skeptical about taking something to make my hair grow faster. But after a few weeks of taking it, it really did seem like my hair was speeding up! I was happy to learn about the weight loss side effects, but paid more attention to my hair. I got a really unfortunate haircut where the lady cut it way too short, so I was desperate for some sort of natural fix. I'd buy this again, but hopefully I'll never get such a bad haircut again!
customer_reviews.author: katya

customer_reviews.title: If your hair is falling out, it might be a coincidence.
customer_reviews.text: So when I started taking this I noticed that I had more hair fall than I'd ever had before. So I stopped, but the hair fall continued. I'd read some reviews here where others had a similar experience. However, when I went to my doctor she tested my thyroid levels (I have hyperthyroid) my numbers were way out of whack. It seems that it was a coincidence that I started having symptoms when I started taking these pills. She recommended I use Nioxin shampoo and conditioner, which so far has made a big difference, and I resumed taking these pills. I did start to breakout, but that's because I wasn't taking the zinc with it.
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: Can't take anymore due to side effects
customer_reviews.text: I've only been taking one a day for just a few days and already have to stop. Constant headaches from the time I wake up and lasted for days. Extreme nausea, stomach cramps, and digestive issues. They are very easy to swallow and don't taste bad. I wish I could continue taking them to see if they would have benefited my thinning hair, but the negatives are just too much for me to progress further. Really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Acne Prone
customer_reviews.text: Okay I got these on the 14th of July. Its day four of trying these out. My skin is always clean and clear. Yea I get acne but rarely. Just two days ago, I started breaking out crazy on my chin and between my brows. I have noticed my hair looks fuller. But not worth the acne on my face. I dont recommend these. These vitamins made me break out like crazy on my chin. See the difference between my cheek and my chin.🤨 my skin has been getting really dry too. Hence the shine on my face.
customer_reviews.author: Originalfools

customer_reviews.title: Really works to grow hair!
customer_reviews.text: This works great to grow hair! This brand works better than double the strength of others I've tried. It must be because of the coconut oil. I'm guessing it helps the absorbtion, not to mention it's also good for your hair And for the people who complain that they look cloudy sometimes but not others, it's because that's how coconut oil is! It solidifies when cooler or cold, therefore making it look cloudy. When it warms up, it turns clear. Do your research before leaving negative reviews!
customer_reviews.author: sarhlynn456Top Contributor: Nail Polish

customer_reviews.title: Caution, causes acne break out in some people!
customer_reviews.text: Read the reviews about break outs on the face! I started breaking out about a month after I started them. It got worse because I did not know what was causing it. I started to think what was new, make up, food etc. But nothing seemed to be the cause until I read some of the reviews! I stopped taking immediately. There must be some ingredient that causes this because I have taken vitamins for hair, nails and skin for over 10 years and changed brands about 2 months ago. So beware if you start to break out!
customer_reviews.author: Liz D.

customer_reviews.title: Grows hair. Creates Acne 😔
customer_reviews.text: I rated three stars only for personal issues i had with biotin. The product works for growing hair, but my face could not handle the biotin. My acne got so bad it was embarassing! Im 27 and have never had bad acne but this product made me breakout in the most painful pimples and in the same reocurring areas. If you can handle biotin this product will def. Work for hair growth. I took it for 2 whole months before finally calling quits as my acne would not go away. Im now acne free taking prenatal vitamins to use for hair growth!
customer_reviews.author: Justin and Jillian Priscilla

customer_reviews.title: This biotin is effective
customer_reviews.text: I started using this product about three months ago after a severe round of hair loss. I have noticed such a difference in my nails especially - they're strong and thick for the first time in my life, and I am noticing definite regrowth in my hair! I will absolutely continue this product. I've used biotin in the past, but after researching, found this to be the best reviewed, cleanest biotin for a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: jljohnston22

customer_reviews.title: Great product, Amazing for hair and nails, also your skin!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product primarily for my nails and hair, it does also boost the radiance of your skin, gives it a healthy look! The Softgels are easy to swallow and there's no harsh after taste. I noticed a big difference in both nails and hair personally in the first 10 days of using it. The product is made with organic virgin coconut oil, along with Non-GMO Rice Bran Wax, Tapioca Starch, Vegetable Glycerin, Purified Water. Does contain tree nuts, (Coconut) In addition to being manufactured with Milk, Eggs, Fish, Crustacean Shellfish, Peanuts, Wheat, Soy/ Gluten. (For those of you wondering.) This product comes with 120 Veggie Softgels also RDI recommended is one a day.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph T. Anders

customer_reviews.title: Seem Fine
customer_reviews.text: Seem to be decent value, 120 pills for $12. Pretty smart to combine coconut oil and biotin. Personally, I don't care about whether the product is vegan/organic/gluten free. So I'm wondering if there would've been cheaper options that are just regular. Haven't seen any noticeable health-related results, but it's just biotin/coconut oil so I don't really expect much. Also, the pills tend to stick together, but this is a very minor complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: Take these daily
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for something to improve my hair growth and I really like these. They are small, easy to swallow, and smell/taste like coconut from the coconut capsule. A much more pleasant pill-taking experience than many of the other pills and supplements I have taken in my life. Update photos to follow as I'm not sure yet how much this has improved my hair/skin/nails. I will say though that my breakouts are far and few between these days (knock on wood), and my nails and hair seem to be strong and healthy. Will pay attention to take before and after pics of hair and nails going forward and will be back in the future with an update.
customer_reviews.author: Lorelei

customer_reviews.title: Do not like how it made me feel
customer_reviews.text: Took this for about a week and had to stop. Every time I took it, I would notice within an hour that I felt like I just took something with a lot of sodium in it. Does not feel healthy, and I do not take any other meds and am very healthy otherwise so not an interaction. Bummed as I hoped it would work.
customer_reviews.author: Saphyress

customer_reviews.title: Helping.  Quality you can see and feel.
customer_reviews.text: Have used only 2 months so not complete in evaluating. However, the texture of my hair has changed & feels healthier somehow. Will continue close observation for improved hair growth. Having hair loss issues due to health and aging, but I combine this with collagen peptides for optimal effect. Losing hair as result from high stress and age. Caregiver for Alzheimer’s husband & hair loss increased. I seemed to lose less hair within a month and it feels thicker again after 6-8 months on SR Biotin. Thank you for quality I can rely upon! BHC, RN, BSN
customer_reviews.author: Bebe

customer_reviews.title: Resulted in terrible skin breakouts!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product to assist with getting some length in my hair. It arrived promptly and as described. I started taking it and 3 days in my skin immediately started breaking out. I knew this was a risk but thought I could handle it. I continued using for another couple of days but the breakouts continued. This is unusual for me, particularly as they are such significant and so many blind pimple breakouts in one go. I have done some more research on this and it seems to be part and parcel of taking the product. I’ve now ceased use and won’t be continuining as it’s not worth it for me to have my skin turn horrible!
customer_reviews.author: Candice G

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: Update! My husband started taken this on January 17th. Things seemed fine. He started experiencing pain in his muscles but we never thought it could be this. YES this is why his muscle had tighten up. No one should be consuming this amount of Biotin it is unsafe and unfortunately we found out this way.
customer_reviews.author: Mesha

customer_reviews.title: Definitely cause zits do not purchase
customer_reviews.text: I first purchased this iteam with out looking at the negative reviews about the zits that it can cause . So a couple of days after purchasing I looked at the negative reviews and saw that there was so many complaints about how this product makes u break out in zits and I’m like ok that’s fine maybe I won’t break out So I took them and what do u know I took them for two days only and I have the biggest zits on my face and other places in my Body. I Never get zits NEVER . So I know for a fact that these biotin pills cause zits.
customer_reviews.author: dee

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Ive been using this product for almost a month now and it has been working great, seems to be growing my hair faster then normally! I got my hair trimed right before I started taking them, which I think helped move the process little also. I take one every morning when I wake up. And have been going that for about 25 days now. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler R.

customer_reviews.title: Best Biotin Ever!!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't want to write a review until I've been using it for more than 3 months. Well it's been more than 3 months and I'm on my 2nd bottle. My diet has drastically changed since Feb and my hair is much thicker and growing. Other Biotin products I wouldn't see actual results with my hair but I would start experiencing hair growth in other places 😣. I'm seeing results in strong hair and I love it. Definitely would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: EB

customer_reviews.title: Great for dry, damaged hair and dry skin
customer_reviews.text: My hair was damaged from hot curling and flat irons. I purchased Sports Research biotin specifically because of the coconut oil. It is great for those like me with dry skin and dry hair. I would not recommend this brand if you have oily skin! My hair grew really fast and grew in more healthy than ever before! Unlike other reviewers, it did not make my nails grow ( which was disappointing) but since I bought it for my hair, that was my main concern. I used the entire bottle exactly as it says. At the end of the 3 months, I noticed my eye lashes were longer! That was unexpected and was super cool! I've purchased my second bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Hunt&Fish

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works on men too!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a male using this with hopes develop a more full, thicker beard. I'm beginning to notice a difference after 15 days, which is great. The pills are easy to take and I've had no negative side effects. The only downside (if you want to call it that), is that my eyebrows and nose hairs are going crazy. Maybe TMI, but worth sharing, lol! That's a price I'm willing to pay. I'll continue using this.
customer_reviews.author: TB2000

customer_reviews.title: Great for Hair and Nails
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this product for several years now and it’s made a tremendous difference in not only the thickness of my thinning hair, but my skin and nails too. My nails used to be thin and chipped easily, but they’re super strong now! With any hair/skin/nails supplement, you to commit to at least 6 months because it’s literally changing you from the inside out and unfortunately hair and nails just take time to grow.
customer_reviews.author: Alaina

customer_reviews.title: Repurchased Bottle #2
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this the first two weeks. 5 stars all the way because my nails were growing super long, super fast. They actually grew so long I had to cut them down. After about a month something changed (same bottle, same pills) and my nails are not growing like they were at first. I will still give it 4 stars and continue to repurchase, because my hair and scalp are so much healthier. No more flaking scalp, and no more dead ends. I love that! Wish my nails were still growing because I was super excited about that.....but overall great product!
customer_reviews.author: cathy rigby

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: With this product I notice considerably stronger nails. My hair doesn't break and looks healthier as well. I had taken Biotin before and forgot to reorder. I had peeling nails so re-ordered and they started getting stronger again. No question that this works!
customer_reviews.author: susan j

customer_reviews.title: Worked faster and better than I expected.
customer_reviews.text: My hair was falling out like crazy - I had to clean my brushes twice a week. After using this for three weeks my excessive hair loss seems to have stopped - improved even after one week. I was not expecting such a good result. The cause of my hair loss? Age (71), lots of stress, anesthesia - could be any of these. But it has definitely stopped. I'm very pleased, and now my husband has bought some.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret O.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to take
customer_reviews.text: These are tasteless and tiny- so they are super easy to take. I’m taking several vitamins for my hair, so I’m not sure which one is doing more. I’d like to think it’s a combination of all of them. I have an autoimmune disorder and lost a huge amount of hair! I can definitely tell that it is growing faster and I see a lot of baby hairs around my temples and crown area.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Caused massive breakouts
customer_reviews.text: The before and after pictures on these reviews made it an easy decision to buy. However, I took for about a week consistently and ended up throwing them out. I never get pimples or break outs, if I do they are isolated. A few days into taking these I had tiny pimples and bumps across my entire face and then they started on my chest and back. I read further into the reviews and saw some people had the same reaction. I stopped taking them on a Monday and by Friday my skin was perfectly clear and back to normal.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: This really works!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I have tried other brands of hair and nail products but this one works the best for me. When I take it everyday I have noticed my nails and hair are both healthier. I used to randomly take it but have made it part of my nighttime ritual and it really helps. I had last a lot of weight very fast and my hair was falling out when I started trying this type of product. This one by far has the best results. I can actually see the short new hairs in the crown of my head. When you are over 60 you really worry about losing hair!!
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: Small and Easy to swallow
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. What I like best about this product is that they are small and easy to swallow with no funky smell or taste. I also maintain a keto diet and I’m sure the coconut oil help keeps me in ketosis. I have used one bottle so far. I haven’t noticed new hair growth but it does seem that my hair looks healthier and definitely thicker. My husband also said that I have a “pregnancy glow”. I’m definitely NOT with child so I’m going to take that as a compliment thanks to this product. Just received my second bottle and hope to update my review.
customer_reviews.author: Inga

customer_reviews.title: Journey to Healthier Hair!
customer_reviews.text: My hair started thinning over a year ago. A friend told me to take biotin, I researched the best product because I hate taking supplements if they aren't real. Many products don't actually contain the amount you are expecting to intake. Luckily I found sports research. Since I started taking Biotin, after 30 days I notice less shedding and healthier hair.I'm going to continue to take this product and will update in 60 days.
customer_reviews.author: Jacome Family

customer_reviews.title: Too soon to know
customer_reviews.text: I haven't been taking this very long- less than a month - so too soon to know if it will help. I started on blood thinning meds due to a blood clot about a month ago and I have had a lot of hair loss due to it. Even though hair loss is not a listed side effect I have read that many other people have experienced the same problem with blood thinning meds. I chose this product because it doesn't contain a ton of ingredients. Some of the more expensive products with multiple ingredients may not be suitable to take when on these meds so the choices are limited.
customer_reviews.author: AVOCADO

customer_reviews.title: Taking for hair loss.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been taking Biotin for hair loss and it appears to be helping. The capsules are very small and easy to swallow. This is the 4th time I’ve ordered from this company. I’m sure the progress is slow, it’s hard to notice hair growing back, but I’ve also noticed I haven’t been losing as much either. Time will tell but so far I’m happy with the price and ease of product
customer_reviews.author: Stephie B

customer_reviews.title: It got my face completely full of acne!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this product because I’ve been losing a lot of hair lately, so I hoped this was going to help me with that, but instead I’ve been using it for almost three weeks, and it got my face completely full of acne, I’ve never had the face that bad before, and I still haven’t notice any difference with my hair, so I’m very disappointed about this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ana trujillo

customer_reviews.title: I have had better results from other products
customer_reviews.text: My hair has not grown as I've expected. I have had better results from other products. I don't like doing bad reviews and was looking forward to sharing my success. I actually also cut back on the dosage due to my face started breaking out more than normal. It actually has left some black marks on my face like another viewer had added before my purchase. It could be some of my doing but I didn't really do anything different but this product so I'll leave it with a 3 star!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works TOO well for me
customer_reviews.text: Commitment is key. Definitely has helped me growing my head hair, sadly it also grows all other hairs, which has became a pain during this pandemic :(. I didn’t even remember how my eyebrows looked naturally, but hey, I'm rocking my beautiful long hair haha
customer_reviews.author: MedinaD

customer_reviews.title: Works well with great ingredients
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking this brand for a while now and appreciate both the brand and the ingredients. This biotin works better than the generic store brand I use to take as my hair and nails grow in much quicker! Plus without all the garbage I noticed common vitamins have with no added value for having it in there. Especially this one with the coconut oil in it has added benefits as well. I've even recommended this to a friend who has since switched to this brand as well. Will definitely continue to buy!
customer_reviews.author: mattydanz

customer_reviews.title: Great for strengthening hair!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product now for about 2 months. I purchased because I was losing more hair than I ever have before. I was constantly shedding. I can say after 2 months of continuous use I definitely see a difference and I am satisfied with the results. I am hopeful it will continue to improve and I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: It really works!
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased Biotin in a different brand and it gave me horrible headaches, I was hesitant to try again but this brand seem to do the trick minus the headaches. I've only taken it for 2 weeks but my hair looks a little healthier, I noticed growth and my nails are growing and very strong and thick I should say, overall so far I'm happy with this product and will definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Titly

customer_reviews.title: Hair skin nails, Menopause!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was prescribed this product by My Meridian Regulatory Acupuncturist and Faith healer, Dr. Issam Nemeh out of Cleveland,Ohio who prescribed it to me for changes due to menopause. I was aware of its usefulness in Hair, nails and skin but wasn’t aware of the uses gynecologically. He also informed me of the usefulness in conditions like MS where the nervous system and Spinal cord are involved. I’m using Hyaluronic acid now too as my skin is showing age related changes and I think the two combined are a one-two punch for combatting dryness and dullness.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Ives

customer_reviews.title: Be patient, you'll see results.
customer_reviews.text: I typically take this as a daily vitamin every morning when I eat breakfast. It's been 18 days since I've started taking it and I'm seeing results. My nail are much stronger and growing quite long! As for my hair, I'm not seeing a huge difference just yet, but I'm thinking I won't see it for at least another 2 months, as my hair is damaged and fragile. I'm definitely going to keep taking them.
customer_reviews.author: VernalMoments

customer_reviews.title: Not helping to grow my hair
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure why, but I have not seen any improvement in my hair growth since the start of using this product. I have used it consistently, every day for the past 32 days, taking one pill per day as the instructions recommend. Maybe the instructions should include more recommendations...otherwise the product is simply not working for the purpose of hair growth.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Good for thinning hair
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mom as her hair is starting to thin. Since she’s been using this she’s noted extra hair growth...new short hairs are growing in. Update: She’s been using this for about 8 months now and has noticed her hair seems fuller. She says her nails are definitely less brittle too and that the capsules are easy to swallow as they small.
customer_reviews.author: mhp_1Top Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Thicker, Longer Hair with This Biotin.
customer_reviews.text: I love these. I was showing signs of baldness and thinning hair. So I started buying all different brands of Biotin. I wasn't seeing any results. Until I started taking these. You can see the new hair growth. I have less hair falling out and less hair in my brush and sink. These are super easy to swallow and don't have a bad taste. Even my hairstylist noticed better texture. She commented how fast my hair is growing too!! I will continue to buy this brand. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: E. L. Yassine

customer_reviews.title: Top Product
customer_reviews.text: I have been exploring the different supplements from Sports Research and the Biotin 5,000MCG did not disappoint. They are easy to swallow and the capsule is clear so you can actually see what's in each one. They are also vegan and gluten-free. I have been taking these for over a month and will continue with this company for all of my supplement needs.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Break outs, not worth the money for ONLY biotin
customer_reviews.text: For the price of the vitamins it’s not worth the hype! Which is my fault it’s LITERALLY only biotin! Get some better hair growth or supplements with a variety of vitamins PLUS biotin they’re way better! I took these for 2 months with little results, however I BROKE OUT!!! I’ve had a handful of pimples in MY WHOLE life I’m 30 with skin I’ve never had a problem with. Until I took these! Nope they had to go
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Great product, my hair has grown 2 inches in ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product, my hair has grown 2 inches in a month. Love Sports Research's products and will be purchasing more in the future to hopefully grow my hair to its desired length. It does promote radiant skin and nail growth. Not sure if it makes the nails stronger, so I can't say. I don't have knowledge in homeopathic remedies. I advise start out in smaller doses if you are sensitive and I've read that if you consume a sufficient amount of water everyday while taking it, it will counteract the side effect of acne break out. I didn't noticed any body hair growth which I am thankful about.
customer_reviews.author: Machunga

product_meta.title: Biotin (5,000mcg) with Coconut Oil | Supports Healthy Hair, Skin & Nails in Biotin deficient Individuals | Non-GMO Verified & Vegan Certified (120 Veggie-Softgels)
